attributes

Class Exceptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • attributes.Exceptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attribute

    public class Exceptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attribute
    A Class that models the Exceptions Attribute. This shows the Exception classes, as opposed to where they are thrown. See Code class for the thrown portion.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ConstantPool cp
      The table data is parsed from.
      short exlength
      Length of exception table
      ClassInfo[] info
      The array of Exception-deriving classes.
      byte[] table
      The table, which actually has the length of exlength * 2 Just the byte array, as opposed to real values

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Exceptions(byte[] b, ConstantPool cp)
      A convenience method to conform to the DefaultAttribute constructor
      Exceptions(short exlength, byte[] extable, ConstantPool cp)
      A basic constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void parseValues(ConstantPool cp)
      A method that messes with the results to get a meaningful answer
      java.lang.String toString()
      A toString() that just returns the exception table classes.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Exceptions

        public Exceptions(short exlength,
          byte[] extable,
          ConstantPool cp)
        A basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        exlength - the length of the following table, divided by 2
        extable - the table of values, currently bytes. Needs to be parsed
        cp - The ConstantPool from which data is parsed

      • Exceptions

        public Exceptions(byte[] b,
          ConstantPool cp)
        A convenience method to conform to the DefaultAttribute constructor
        Parameters:
        b - the exlength and extable, mashed into one
        cp - The ConstantPool from which data is parsed
